</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/comment/{type}/{docId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get comments from a document of type (groups, members, customFronts, etc.)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"docId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"String Id of the document you wish to get comments from"},{"in":"path","name":"type","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Type of the comment (groups, members, customFronts, etc.)"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

>
